Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Zhipianbang, Shenzhen Network Technology Co., Ltd. leverages the Internet+ model to achieve resource sharing for commercial video production. By utilizing big data algorithms, Zhipianbang precisely matches suitable commercial video production teams to small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs), thereby reducing management costs related to time, budget, and communication for both suppliers and demanders. The company provides high-quality video creative production services.

The founding team of Zhipianbang has been deeply involved in the commercial video creation industry for many years. They have assembled a large pool of professionals specializing in content planning, video creative production, internet operations, and marketing. Furthermore, Zhipianbang has collaborated with thousands of film production teams across major cities such as Beijing, Shanghai, Shenzhen, and Guangzhou, both domestically and internationally. The company has established three regional branches in North China, East China, and Southeast China, and is gradually realizing one-stop chain services within the commercial video sector.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Promotional videos, advertising clips, film and television cultural works, and other video content.
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America
Project.How will you be distributing your data t: HTTP or FTP server, Shipping hard drives
